features: 【Modern Appearance Design】Comfortable and flower shape line decorative and rivet element trim, which is exquisite in low profile, and suitable for various styles of space.

【Premium Materials】The surface is made of soft Dutch velvet, which is skin-friendly and easy to clean. The interior of the bed headboard is filled with environmentally friendly high-density rebound sponge , making the back more comfortable to lean on.

【STURDY STRUCTURE】 This upholstered platform bed adopts metal frame structure ，a series of evenly-spaced solid wood slats and center support legs to provide dense and strong support for up to 800lbs， ensure the firmness and stability of the bed frame. The ''+'' shape central support can eliminate sagging and extend the life of your mattress.
【Easy Assembly】 All parts and installation tools are in one box. There are detailed installation steps in the manual, which are simple and easy to operate.

【No Box Spring Needed】This platform bed frame includes 12 durable and evenly-spaced solid wood slats designed to directly support your mattress without the need for springs box.(Please note: Mattress sold separately)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When moving in with family temporarily, we found that my queen box spring would not fit through the upstairs doorway (and subsequently to my bedroom; the mattress, being more flexible, was able to squeeze thru). So, I needed to find something else.I found this frame and fell in love with it. Luckily it is as nice as the photos! The headboard is great quality and soft fabric. At this price it seemed like there must but some negative, but I’ve had it for a month now and haven’t had any issues*. Assembly was fairly easy. It also seems like it will be easy to dissemble enough to fit back out that doorway when the time comes.*My only negative is that the “under bed” storage containers I had previously do not fit underneath this frame. But it’s not a fault in the frame itself. I’m sure I can figure out another way to utilize the space for storage, or get some new containers that WILL fit. Just fyi, there is about 6 inches between the floor and the bottom of the frame.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup, doesn’t break during shmex
reviews.reviewText: Ordered and delivered as expected. Instructions were easy to follow. Handles bedroom activity without breaking. Excellent for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is trash!!! I’ve had this bed frame for nearly a year and it vexes my soul!!! It is cheap poorly designed rubbish!! The legs of the bed always fold and they are impossible to keep straight!! Without the legs standing upright the cheap wooden slates can brake and the bed sags! On the very first day it fell on my completely flat floor and the headboard tore. It has ripped the vinyl flooring of my apartment and will cost me god knows what when I move. Every time I have to move it the legs fold. Every time I breathe the legs fold!! I’m currently struggling to clean underneath my bed and maneuver my mattress and it’s just infuriating.O have purchased to many things from Amazon and have never left a review but I am so upset at this trash that I searched the my hundreds of purchases to write this review. Save your money and sanity and do not buy this disgusting bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: its amazing. more beautiful in person and worth the money. color is gorgeous. thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my Velvet Elvis!
reviews.reviewText: What blew my mind is it all fits in the headboard! Craftsmanship is amazing! Easy to put together, but grab a friend and it goes quickly! I'm am over the top about my bed called Velvet Elvis! Sturdy too that was my concern but don't worry it absolutely is and I feel like I'm on the Vegas Strip! Lolol
